title: Love Story 2050 - 2008 DVD-5
description:
Love Story 2050 - 2008 DVD-5[www.Dmnhubs.com]

Movie Name : Love Story 2050
Year of Release : 2008
Release Date : 4 July 2008
Genre : Science Fiction
Banner : Baweja Movies Pvt. Ltd., Adlabs
Producer : Pammi Baweja
Director : Harry Baweja
Cast : Boman Irani, Archana Puran Singh, Rachit Trehan, Harman Baweja, Priyanka Chopra, Harsh Vasishtha, Mehezabeen Sarela, Karan Verma
Music Director : Anu Malik
Lyricist : Javed Akhtar
Cinematographer : Vijay Arora
Story Writer : Harry Baweja
Dialogue Writer : Mayur Puri
Screenplay Writer : Rowena Baweja, Harry Baweja
Editor : Hemal Kothari
Art Director : Omung Kumar
Action Director : Allan Amin
Costume Designer : Pooja & Theia
Background Sound : Amar Mohile
Choreographer : Vaibhavi Merchant, Remo
Playback Singer : Kay Kay, Alisha Chinai, Shaan, Kunal Ganjawala, Alka Yagnik
Publicity Designer : Marching Ants

Plot : It&#039;s story about Karan (Harman Baweja) a young spirited sporty boy who lives life off the rules and Sana (Priyanka Chopra), a young petite, shy girl who lives lives by the rules. Their interaction thus developes into a magical love story.
Karan&#039;s uncle Dr. Yatinder Khanna (Boman Irani), a whacky scientist has been working on the Time Machine for years, which one day finally, works! Sana expresses her wish to travel time to Mumbai in the year 2050.
What they see in the future is a spectacular city with flying cars, 200 storey building, robots and sky rails that have changed the very face of Mumbai and the world! The two kids, Sana&#039;s brother and sister who have also traveled with them find the new world fascinating.
Through a series of twist and turns, the time traveler Karan finds himself separating from his love. QT, a friendly femme robot and BOO, a small robotic teddy bear play their distinct roles in bringing the love story of Karan and Sana together but soon they find themselves under the threat of the demi god of the future, Dr. Hoshi.
